title: QATrack+
subtitle: A Radiotherapy QA Tool
description:
QATrack+ is a free and open source tool written in Python for recording and monitoring the quality control program of a radiotherapy clinic.

Live demo user/password are demo/demo.

links.title: Try a live demo of QATrack+

title: RxCheck
subtitle: Patient Specific DVH QA
description:
RxCheck is web application I built at The Ottawa Hospital Cancer Centre to do patient specific quality assurance checks (dosimetry constraints) on radiation therapy treatments using dose volume histogram data.
RxCheck is still under development and all rights to the code belong to The Ottawa Hospital Cancer Centre.
Live demo coming soon.

links.title: Try a live demo of RxCheck

title: SaILS
subtitle: Safety and Incident Learning System
description:
SaILS is a Safety and Incident Learning System for recording, investigating and summarizing incidents occuring in a radiation therapy clinic.
SaILS is in use at The Ottawa Hospital Cancer Centre and all rights to the code belong to TOHCC
Live demo coming soon.

links.title: Try a live demo of SaILS

title: Orbis
subtitle: Simple Huckel Molecular Orbital Calculations
description: Orbis is a free and open source program for performing simple Huckel molecular orbital calculations.

title: randlet.com
subtitle: Personal Homepage written with Flask/Frozen Flask
description: Source code for the webpage you're currently visiting :)

title: Power Rack
subtitle: A homemade wooden power rack
description: A wooden power rack I built so that I could begin barbell training.
